## Presentation Tips

- **Pacing:** ~3 minutes per concept slide
- **Interaction:** Ask questions on slides 4, 8, 13
- **Demo:** Have backup slides if demo fails
- **Timing:** 30 min presentation, leave buffer for Q&A
